Value.label: Set to Default
Value.Help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

Value.label: Mode
Value.Help: The mode in which a different Z-Wave message is sent.

Value.label: Double press time
Value.Help: The time that a user has to activate the double button pressed scene, if time is passed then the single pressed button scene is notified. (value * 10 ms)

Value.label: Temperature offset
Value.Help: A signed integer to determine the offset of the temperature.
